tool_description: Organizes and tracks grant application deadlines with milestone reminders and scheduling recommendations for optimal application timeline management.

grant_ids.description: Array of grant opportunity identifiers to track

preparation_weeks.description: Number of weeks needed to prepare each application (1-52)

priority_levels.description: Priority level for each grant (high, medium, low) in same order as grant_ids

current_date.description: Current date for timeline calculations (ISO 8601 format)

error_messages: Invalid grant IDs: One or more grant IDs could not be found in the system.
Invalid preparation weeks: preparation_weeks must be between 1 and 52.
Priority mismatch: Number of priority levels must match number of grant IDs if provided.
Invalid priority level: Each priority must be 'high', 'medium', or 'low'.
Invalid team capacity: Must be one of 'limited', 'moderate', 'high'.
Invalid date format: current_date must be in ISO 8601 date-time format.
usage: Provide an array of grant_ids to track. Optionally specify preparation_weeks, priority_levels array, team_capacity, and current_date. The tool returns organized deadline calendar with milestones and recommendations.

total_grants.description: Total number of grants being tracked

upcoming_deadlines.description: Grant deadlines in chronological order (date-time format)

recommended_start_dates.description: Recommended start dates for each application preparation (date-time format)

milestone_alerts.description: Key milestone dates and reminder descriptions

workload_conflicts.description: Identified potential scheduling conflicts or capacity issues

timeline_feasibility.description: Overall assessment of timeline feasibility (realistic, challenging, unrealistic)
